entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , St. Anthony
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Anthony Airport 7:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.7°C
Pressure: 102.0 kPa
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -6.9°C
Wind: NE 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 5 cm except 10 cm south of Hare Bay. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
